headline: Is Saudi Arabia Still a Major Twitter Shareholder?
description:
There's this: https://www.bbc.com/news/newsbeat-34474798

But then there's this: https://money.cnn.com/quote/shareholders/shareholders.html?symb=TWTR&subView=institutional

Did Saudi Arabia close out its position in Twitter?
headline_zh-Hans: 沙特阿拉伯仍然是推特的主要股东吗？
headline_zh-Hant: 沙特阿拉伯仍然是推特的主要股東嗎？
description_zh-Hans:
有这个：https://www.bbc.com/news/newsbeat-34474798

但随后有这个：https://money.cnn.com/quote/shareholders/shareholders.html?symb=TWTR&subView=institutional

沙特阿拉伯是否关闭了其在推特上的位置？
